author: elfontan
body:
This PR is assigning new code areas developed for the Scouting Offline DQM in [PR#47235](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47235) to the dqm area:
* DQMOffline/HLTScouting
* HLTriggerOffline/Scouting

Thanks @mmusich for the pointer!

[cc: @silviodonato @missirol @mtosi]
title: Scouting Offline DQM developments for 2025
